fullDescription.intro: Allows you to write data back into the Jevis Database. There are three options: Update Datapoint adds the values from the input table. New Datapoint will create a new Datapoint under the given NodeID. Delete Data will allow you to remove all data in a datapoint. It won't delete the Datapoint itself just the data stored in it.
fullDescription.option: Enter the ID of the Datapoint.
Enter the name of the new Datapoint.
Enter the name of the DataPoint class.

ports.inPort: DataTable containing Timestamps in the first column and Values in the 2nd column.
